task.title: Adding snippets drawers
task.shortdesc: This documentation explains how to customize the Snippets view by adding a new drawer.

taskbody.context: To add a new drawer to the Snippets view:

step.cmd: Right-click anywhere in the Snippets view and select Customize from the pop-up menu.
Click NewCategory and type the name of the new drawer in the Name field.
Optionally, type a description in the Description field.
Select the drawer's behavior by checking check boxes as appropriate. The check boxes are as follows:

chrow.chdesc: At start-up, display the drawer's items.

step.cmd: Click OK. The new drawer will be added to the list of drawers in the Snippets view.
